column4: I was upgrading everything via apt-get upgrade i got this error http://pastebin.com/m4dd5fc93 i'm on 8.04
apt-get -f install, apt-get upgrade, apt-get update, /etc/init.d/acpid stop, dpkg --configure -a => ALL RUN AS SUDO, all stops with a error saying ACPID is not configured
Please help me solve this, it's a dedibox, all I have is root access, reinstalling is a problem
Please don't flood, use http://paste.ubuntu.com to paste, don't use Enter as punctuation.
